root.name: Pat & Mat: The Game
root.description: GameplayThe player is taking control of both Pat Mat and solve various tasks by cooperation and help of both characters. Game is based on mini- and microgames, which are kids friendly. The series is famous for their stop-motion and the game tries to capture that feeling although it is fully 3D rendered en real time.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: MS Windows ® XP SP3, MS Windows ® Vista SP1, Windows ® 7Processor: Pentium ® III / Athlon ® XP or betterMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: Nvidia Geforce nVidia GeForce 5000 / ATI Radeon 9000 or betterDirectX®: DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 512MB free space
